mapper.select: SELECT user_id, nickname, a5_price, b5_price, a4_price, color_price, black_price, snow_price, mont_price, arte_price, white_price, ivory_price, rough_price FROM user WHERE role IN('f') AND user_code IN(1) AND color_price IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(blind_code, prod_type, creator, color_type, size_type, cover_type, inner_type, factory_id, book_page, print_price) SELECT "x",#{prodType},#{creator},#{colorType},#{sizeType},#{coverType},#{innerType},#{factoryId},#{bookPage}, ${colorType}_price+${coverType}_price+((${sizeType}_price+${innerType}_price)*${bookPage}) FROM user WHERE user_id IN(#{factoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT prod_no FROM product WHERE creator IN(#{creator}) ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT 1
